name: 柯明村
objective: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
schedule:
1　　Introduction to CFD

2　　The Equations of CFD
  Governing equations of fluid flow and heat transfer
  Conservative form of the governing equations of fluid flow
  Differential and integral form of the general transport equations
  Classification of physical behaviour
  Classification method for simple partial differential equations

3　　Turbulence and its Modelling----Refer: FLUENT UG Chap.10 and Powerpoint
   Characteristics of simple turbulent flows
   Turbulence models
Mixing length model　　The k-ε models
Reynolds stress equation models Algebraic stress equation models
Some recent advances

4　　The Solution Methods----Refer: FLUENT UG Chap.5, Chap.22
　　Grids—Structured, Unstructured
　　Discritization Methods—Finite Difference Method and Finite Volume Method
　　Pressure-Velocity Coupling—SIMPLE, SIMPLER, SIMPLEC, PISO

5　　Boundary Conditions----Refer: FLUENT UG Chap.6
　　Inlet　　　　Outlet
　　Wall boundary conditions　　　　Constant pressure
　　Periodic or cyclic　　　　
6　　The Finite Volume Method for Convection-Diffusion Problems
　　The central differencing scheme
　　Properties of discretisation schemes
Conservativeness, Boundedness and Transportiveness
　　The upwind scheme　　　　The hybrid scheme
　　The power-law scheme　　　　Higher order schemes
　　Other higher order schemes　　　　
7　　Engineering Examples
scorePolicy: 平時成績：點名未到一次扣 5 分　　Final Exam. 6/28(四)　　----- 50% Presentation　　-------------   20%　　        Technical Report　　   --------- 30%
materials: H. K. Versteeg and W. Malalasekera, An introduction to computational fluid dynamics-The finite volume method, Longman Scientific & Technical.
